name: interview-ace
description: AI-powered interview assistant with stealth mode and real-time transcription (FREE - No API keys needed for STT!)

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ELECTRON" -c "blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: npm run build:frontend && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "electron ."
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
